MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr, affecting properties in Upper Crofts and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have located a fault on the underground cable network, our engineers are working to complete the repairs to this and we now expect your supply to be restored by 3.00am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:05AM on 27th February 2021.
